default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Hmph. As an anti-Mania combatant, I will regard this series of actions targeting me as a "work transfer" and follow your arrangement. But if your orders will do harm to that person, please forgive me for my refusal, Chief.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Some day, the tiny currents will merge into a surging tide.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The shadows have vanished, and the sun is overhead... It's time.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Don't be afraid. I won't let anyone hurt you.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Quick, leave now. It's not safe here.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: ...Don't mind me! Take him/her away! Quick!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Eradicate... all... threats!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I'm on a mission... I have to protect... I can't...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Why are you looking at me this way? Are you... expecting some kind of response? Um... all right, hello.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: For me, loyalty is the golden rule that cannot be broken. No matter what happens, my loyalty will not waver.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: If I could reach my goal only at the cost of my life, what more could I ask for?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Rest? That's a luxury I don't deserve... (Sigh) All right, if you really need someone to talk to, I'll give it a shot.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I sought this power, and I will never regret my choice. Only if I had done it sooner... If so, at least I wouldn't have to end up as the failure I am now.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The one who taught me "loyalty" was also the first person I pledged my loyalty to... Strange, who was it? I... I can't remember...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Mania contamination and descent into madness... That's my method for reaching my goal, and also the price I choose to pay. Perhaps one day, I'll lose control. When the time comes, do what you must do for your own safety. Don't hesitate.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Not long ago, I saw only darkness before my eyes. But what you've done for me... it's as if a ray of light has shone into this boundless darkness. Even if this hope is illusory... I will protect you... with all I've got.

default.title: Idle
default.text: ...Don't mind me... It'll all be over soon...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You're the Chief of the MBCC, yet you're doing such things... Have you no shame?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: You don't have to come and keep an eye on me yourself. The shackles won't break that easily. You just want to spend some time with me? Oh, all right.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Got it. I'll go.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission accomplished. Please give me new orders.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Good, keep 'em coming. I need them.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Hmm? You like my... hair? Thank you.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I can eradicate any threats, if that's what it takes to guarantee your safety.

radiant_stealth.title: Obtain Attire
radiant_stealth.text: Arrived at the standby location, awaiting further instructions. Yes, the sun is dazzling and the temperature has risen, which favors the target to change clothes and evade search. We must pay more attention.

radiant_stealth.title: Level Up
radiant_stealth.text: These steps are nothing. Keep going up.

radiant_stealth.title: Greeting
radiant_stealth.text: In order to look more natural and blend into the environment well, we really should engage in some small talk now. In reference to the two office ladies over there, we might talk about our intolerant superiors.

radiant_stealth.title: Ordinary Contact 1
radiant_stealth.text: For me, duties don't change based on dress or role. Regardless of what I wear, I am your escort and will remove all obstacles for your safety. There's nothing uncomfortable about that.

radiant_stealth.title: Ordinary Contact 2
radiant_stealth.text: I've spotted several suspicious figures gathering in the distance, and they seem to be keeping a close eye on our movements... It is difficult to tell if they are armed at this distance. For your safety, we should relocate. Hmm? Just want my contact info? If you run into trouble, it's better to call the sheriff, not me.

radiant_stealth.title: Idle
radiant_stealth.text: Stop. Sit. Up. Passable level of training, but slightly externally inhibited... Hopefully they will remain steady in critical moments and not be distracted by other factors.

radiant_stealth.title: Annoyed
radiant_stealth.text: Touching in this manner is likely to be judged as aggressive behavior by a trained canine. I do not recommend that you continue.

radiant_stealth.title: Special Attention
radiant_stealth.text: Are you gonna stare at me like that until our backup is in position? Stick to your character? Okay... let me know if you need me to respond.

loyal_oath.title: Obtain Attire
loyal_oath.text: I pledge to you, my liege, my lifelong loyalty and protection. From this day onward, we shall share in both glory and hardship, holding a steadfast bond.

loyal_oath.title: Greeting
loyal_oath.text: I've completed my patrol of the estate. All is secure. Do you have any outings today that require my escort?

loyal_oath.title: Ordinary Contact 1
loyal_oath.text: Do whatever you wish to do. I will forever stand by your side. No matter who threatens your safety, I will never allow them to find any opening to exploit.

loyal_oath.title: Ordinary Contact 2
loyal_oath.text: After pledging loyalty, a knight traditionally receives a token from their Lord, a symbol of favor and recognition. But your trust in me is the greatest reward I could ask for.

loyal_oath.title: Ordinary Contact 3
loyal_oath.text: Do whatever you wish to do. I will forever stand by your side. No matter who threatens your safety, I will never allow them to find any opening to exploit.

loyal_oath.title: Ordinary Contact 4
loyal_oath.text: My weapons and strength exist solely to protect. They defend your honor, fulfill your will, and clear all obstacles from the path you walk.

loyal_oath.title: Idle
loyal_oath.text: The sunlight is perfect right now. Why don't we go sit in the garden courtyard downstairs? And enjoy a cup of black tea.

loyal_oath.title: Special Attention
loyal_oath.text: Personal protection is also one of a knight's duties. Since I have sworn my oath to you, you need not worry that I will ever leave your side.

loyal_oath.title: Pat Head
loyal_oath.text: Please don't touch my hair. A knight's appearance reflects your dignity as well. So I prefer to maintain a neat and proper hairstyle.
